name: 葉采青
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
Week	Content
1	Orientation
2	Unit 1 People and Places (ABC)
3	Unit 1 People and Places (DE)
4	Unit 2 The Mind (ABC)
5	Unit 2 The Mind (DE)
6	Unit 3 Changing Planet (ABC)
7	Unit 3 Changing Planet (DE)
8	Review and Exercise
9	Midterm exam
10	Unit 4 Money (ABC)
11	Unit 4 Money (CD)
12	Unit 5 Survival (ABC)
13	Exercise
14	Unit 5 Survival (DE)
15	Unit 6 Art (ABC)
16	Unit 6 Art (DE)
17	Review and Exercise
18	Final exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation: 35%
Exercise: 30%
Midterm exam: 15%
Final exam: 20%
materials: Johannsen, Kristin L. and Rebecca Tarver Chase. World English 3. Boston: Heinle, 2010.
